.. _index:

Flimage is a Python library for handling fluorescence data.
Its API is (as much as it makes sense) is identical to that of
:ref:`qpimage <qpimage:index>`, making it a
convenient tool for phase- and fluorescence colocalization.
This is the documentation of flimage version |release|.
